cab.content: V/AE CABINET.CONTROL OP MILITARY OPERATIONS AT ADEN.Extract from Minutes of the Seventh Heeting[ of the Mesopotamia Aaministration^gommittie, held"oh ffaburday, July 21st, 1917.Control of Mill-tary Forces at Aden.2. (a) The Committee recommend that the War Office should take over control of Military operations at Aden. The Jar Cabinet and Chief of the Imperial General Staff to be informed accord-ingly.
